name: @interledger/connection-tag-utils
description: Utilities for encrypted STREAM connection tags
author: Interledger Team <info@interledger.org>

scripts.cover: nyc --extension .ts --reporter=json --reporter=html --require ts-node/register/transpile-only --ui mocha-typescript --require source-map-support/register mocha test/*.spec.ts
scripts.test: mocha --require ts-node/register/transpile-only --ui mocha-typescript --require source-map-support/register --watch-extensions ts test/*.ts
